# name; amount; type; trigger based on type (once: day as dd.mm.yyyy; weekly: day as dd; monthly: day as dd; yearly: day as dd.mm)
salary; 1666; monthly; 21
rent; -666; monthly; 01
christmas money; 100; 24.12
current state: 19.08.2019

# structure and naming are part of the implementation process and can be changed without further notice
